text: Eteke yadi si straika talakba diye tente se'i strai tara babe halala naha’ba, yetiya laike ta'i ana sbamira lagata milita naha’ba. Tara pichata yadi sihamta ubhaye (strai arau prathama sbami) anubhara karae ye, sihamte allahara simaraekha raksa karaiba paraiba, tente sihamtara punara milanata karao eko aparaadha naha’ba. E'ibora allahara simaraekha, yibora te'om spastabharae ene sampradayara babe barnana karae yisakale jane
